p: Xcms package [ 24] was used for UPLC–MS data processing. Optimal parameters were chosen with the aid of the IPO (Isotopologue Parameter Optimization) package [ 25]. Peak intensities were obtained using the peak Table function implemented in the xcms package with method = ‘maxint’. As a result, a set of peaks characterized by the retention time, mass divided by charge, and intensity were obtained for each sample.
